item.title: Readings
item.description: Key [AC] = Stanley, Richard P. Algebraic Combinatorics: Walks, Trees, Tableaux, and More. Springer, 2018. ISBN: 9783319771724. Online 2013 version. [EC1] = ———. Enumerative Combinatorics. Vol. 1. Cambridge, UK: Cambridge University Press, 1997. ISBN: 9780521553094. Online version. [EC2] = ———. Enumerative Combinatorics. Vol. 2. Cambridge, UK: Cambridge University Press, 2001. ISBN: 9780521789875. Lecture sessions with reading assignments are listed below. LEC # TOPICS READINGS 2 Catalan numbers (cont.): formula for Cn, reflection principle, necklaces, triangulations of polygons, plane binary trees, parenthesizations.
